item.title: Sara sword emote. [HARDCODED]
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

Probably already been released w.e credits to whoever wants them
This is the runescape sara sword special emote.
You need SWAT’s new header.

Download the animation file here:
UppIT - Free File hosting - 232.dat

And add this into your class20 with all the other emotes.

if(j == 5637){ // sara sword emote int file = 232; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = { 126,167,178,189,200,211,213,214,215,157,158, 159, 160, 161, 162, 163,164,165,166,168,169,170,171,172,173,174,175,176,177,179,180,181,182, 183,184,185,186,187,188,190,191,192,193,194,195,196,197,198,199,201,202, 203,204,205,206,207,208,209,210,212,0}; int[] frames2 = {0}; int[] delays = {2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,22,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2, 2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,0}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length - 1; i2++) { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2] + FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = delays[i2]; } }

Read full topic
